title: Republicans Debate Defense Spending
teaser: The debate within the Republican party over defense spending is  threatening the party's ability to advance a budget blueprint.
contentencoded:
Republicans now in charge of Congress are set to introduce its budget proposal — which is pitting defense hawks against budget hawks within the party.

Derek Thompson of the Atlantic speaks to Here & Now’s Jeremy HobsonÂ discuss defense spending in historical context — and whether more funding has meant better readiness.
